worst iqi air quality index in the

health. The top on the list is New

followed by Daka, the capital.  of Bangladesh

air.  New Australian research into
post-injury recovery is of
great interest, encouraging
people with the condition to exercise in
water. Lead researcher Kate Davidson
says aquatic therapy is
more effective in helping  injury recovery
because the interaction between the brain and the
body is handled differently than on
land the determin to research program
in aday is currently offering
these aquatic therapy classes participants
must be qualified  Before I was allowed
to practice, I had many
surgeries. At that time, everything was very
difficult. I felt better, had
more energy, ate better, slept better, and
this water therapy was very helpful.  It is beneficial
for many people because they do not need to
submerge their heads in water to practice.
This therapy program has held more than
10,000 sessions and has not recorded any
incidents in Australia and New Zealand.

event, a mother elephant has just given birth to twins at
Saru reserve in northern Kenya. This is a
rare case in elephants. Information has
just been announced by the wild elephant protection organization
Safety Elephant.
Mother elephant Anto has given birth.  Pictures of two baby elephants
from the reserve show that they
have integrated well with the herd of elephants. Twins are a
very rare phenomenon in elephants with
a rate of only 1 minute for a female to be pregnant for 22
months, about 4 years for a litter of elephants to have a baby.  The
longest lifespan of any mammal species
last year, this reserve also recorded
a birth to a male elephant and a
female elephant. Ken currently has about 36,000
elephants. According to 2021 statistics,
this number is 12 times higher than before.  With 2014 statistics at the peak
of the ivory trade, the
Nature Conservation Alliance
warns that poaching and deforestation to clear
land for agriculture are having a
devastating impact on elephants in
Africa.  The
next episode in 60 Seconds District 12
confirmed that there was no scene set up by strangers with
the intention of kidnapping students in front of
Ha Huy
Giap school. A truck hit a motorbike, causing two people to be
seriously injured.
] The
People's Committee of District 12 of Ho Chi
Minh City has issued an official information document
confirming that there was no scene where someone set up a
scene to approach students to give money to students with the intention of
shaking hands in front of the gate of Ha
Huy Giap Primary School before.  On the evening of November 23,
a number of electronic newspapers posted
information about the case of a 5th grade student at
Ha Huy Giap Primary School who was approached by a strange woman to
give money for bad purposes. The
incident caused confusion for many people.  People
and parents The People's Committee of District M Hai
has directed the district police to use
cameras to investigate the incident, through which the police
verified that the woman who gave money to the student
was Ms. l. A parent with a child studying at
this school.  When I saw my child borrowing money from a
friend in front of the school gate, but the friend didn't have any
money, he only took 20,000 VND for him. Through the
incident, the People's Committee of District 12 also recommended that
schools in the district promote
propaganda and close coordination between
In order to ensure the safety of students, families and schools
this morning, a truck carrying
poultry traveling on provincial highway C
Chi district, Ho Chi Minh City, crashed into the
median and collided with the motorbike of
a couple.  husband and wife seriously injured two people
around 7:00 this morning. A truck was driving
on Provincial Highway 8 from
Ho Chi Minh City to Binh Duong. As it passed through the
gate of the Southeast Industrial Park, the truck
crashed into the road median.  In the middle of the
road, the car continued to pass in the
opposite direction and hit a motorbike belonging to a
couple. As a result, the couple was
swept under the truck and was seriously injured.
People took them to the hospital for emergency treatment at the
scene of the car.  The truck was blocking the
provincial highway, causing serious congestion. The
Northwest traffic police and Binh My
commune police were present to warn the traffic there was no
accident. Also this morning, a
traffic accident occurred.  In Thu
Dau 1 city, Binh Duong province, a victim
died. Authorities are
investigating the cause of the incident.
Nearly 10 hours ago, a tractor-trailer without license plate was
running on Pham Ngoc Thach street
toward the provincial general hospital.  Binh
Duong went to Highway 13 in Hiep
Thanh Ward. When reaching Highway 13, the young vehicle
had to head towards Ben Cat town while
taking a turn, colliding with a motorbike
driven by 37-year-old Ms. Kim Thi Hanh in the same direction as the
accident.  The motorbike was thrown onto the sidewalk and the
victim fell onto the road and was run over by a tractor and
died on the spot. The police were
present. The scene was cleared to regulate
traffic for nearly 12 hours. The scene was
examined and the victim's body was examined.
moved back home close to another case of

owned until the next morning. The subject called to

due to suspicion, she went to the
Cam My district military regulation board to ask. At this point, she
realized that she had been deceived.  Then she went to the
police station to report to the Vietnamese police.
Two weeks in Cam My district,
the subjects impersonated
military officers of the district, tricked orders and took
81.5 VND from two retail stores.
Early this afternoon in Hai
Phong city, a fire broke out at a
chemical factory. The fire was promptly extinguished
without causing human damage
around 1:00 p.m. This afternoon, people
discovered a fire broke out at a factory.
containing chemicals in Thai Son commune, An Lao district,
Hai Phong city. In just a few minutes,
the fire quickly spread and black smoke
billowed out. On-site firefighting efforts were
unsuccessful. We received news that the
fire department had dispatched
Specialized vehicles and soldiers were involved
in extinguishing the fire, but no one was injured in the
fire, but the property inside the
factory was caught on fire, but the cause of
the fire is being investigated by the authorities.

13 Israeli women and children and b

notified the families.  related previously
